thread.title: Feeling hungry? You won’t after this
thread.title_full: Feeling hungry? You won’t after this

author: news.com.au
title: Feeling hungry? You won’t after this
text:
Brock Hekking close to the end of a beast of a feast.
The Daily Telegraph WE all know that athletes need more fuel than your average Joe but an NFL footballer’s attack on the menu at a San Diego restaurant is beyond belief.
An NFL linebacker by the name of Brock Hekking has eaten a ridiculous 21,396 calories in just 43 minutes and it has all been recorded for posterity by the team from the Bleacher Report .
Ribs, hamburgers, onion rings as big as Texas and some unidentifiable food stuffs were all part of the San Diego rookie’s feast.
Brock Hekking is hungry For those obsessed by figures, of the mathematical kind rather than the body type, Hekking who weighs in at 115 kilograms and 190 cms, consumed 497 calories per minute.
In case you are curious, an average male needs around 2500 calories a day to maintain his health.
Do not try this at home
Originally published as Feeling hungry? You won’t after this
